data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Královéhradecký.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Královéhradecký, Czechia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Královéhradecký who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Královéhradecký, Czechia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Královéhradecký, Czechia that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Mongol, Khalka people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, teach the young people in the state of Královéhradecký to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 4,030 believers living in the state of Královéhradecký. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Královéhradecký, Czechia that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.
